content: 1 vee-kerchief pattern the vee-kerchief pattern is loosely inspired by the owl house and is beginner friendly the finished piece has a height of about 11 and a base of about 18 plus two 8 ties this can be adjusted according to preference please respect and follow the publishing guidelines outlined in the pattern footnotes enjoy by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product 2 materials - 4 5 mm crochet hook similar sizes can be used but this may affect final size - worsted weight yarn in o colour a olive green o colour b dark blue - yarn needle - scissors terminology us - chain chain - chain space chain space - slip_stitch slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - double_crochet double_crochet - treble_crochet triple crochet - picot number of chains in a picot will be denoted as number chain picot chain the number of chains indicated then slip_stitch in the first chain made - increase increase the type of stitch will be denoted as stitch increase - granny cluster 3 double crochets worked into one chain space - fo finish off - instructions bracketed by are to be done in one stitch or chain space as indicated - instructions bracketed by are to be repeated as indicated by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product 3 this piece is worked in three parts the main piece is worked in row to make a triangle the edging is worked around the main piece the ties are a chain joined to the main piece as you go with its ends worked in the round with edging added pattern main piece in colour a - chain 6 slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring you will begin row 1 in this ring - row 1 chain 4 counts as a starting double_crochet + chain here and throughout 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet turn - row 2 chain 4 in chain space granny cluster chain 1 in the 3 chain space granny cluster chain 3 granny cluster chain 1 in the next chain space granny cluster chain 1 double_crochet turn - row 3 chain 4 in each chain space until the chain 3 space granny cluster chain 1 in the 3 chain space granny cluster
